name: Stand &Fight
description:
Stand & Fight is a game about looking for the past to understand where your strength comes from, and fight back against those who try to push you down for who you are.

Find your spirit from the past, and use your new powers to keep your traditions!

HOW TO PLAY

Move with the left virtual analog, and press the skills buttons to use multiple attacks against your opponents.

CREDITS
